TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit KeyNotFoundException extends System.SystemException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.para: The exception that is thrown when the key specified for accessing an element in a collection does not match any key in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An application error has occurred." This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The message that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understandable to the user. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
